content.Community_Event_Reminder_Descrip: A atual **Campanha do Evento da Comunidade** termina <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! Faça o login e conclua todos os [deeds]({[sot_article_url]}) antes de <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:f>.
content.Miscellaneous_Event_Reminder_Des: The current **Game Event campaign** ends <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! Make sure to login and complete all [deeds]({[details_link]}) before <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:f>.
scheduling.alerts.content.Affiliate_Cosm: {[community_name]} is hosting a {[availability_name]} for the coveted **{[reward_items]}**! You can view more details by [joining]({[community_invite]}) their community.
scheduling.alerts.content.Boost_Event_Ma: Assemble your crew and get ready to set sail — {[main_event_name]} is now live! You'll gain boosted reputation and gold for any activities related to {[boost_faction]}!
scheduling.alerts.content.Capture_a_Code: Deckhand Lootin' Lizalaroo is back with another Capture a Code competition on the forums! Snap a shot of **'{[event_theme]}'** and you'll have a chance to earn a variety of exclusive cosmetics.
scheduling.alerts.content.Community_Even: Raise your tankards and get ready for another community celebration! You can enjoy a boost on gold, reputation, renown, and [more]({[sot_article_url]})!
scheduling.alerts.content.Gold_Rush_Main: Gold Rush is now active until <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:t>, <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! All loot cashed in will enjoy a 1.5x multiplier — so grab that gold!
scheduling.alerts.content.Gold_Twitch_Dr: Tune in and watch [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]}) to earn {[gold_drop_amount_thousands]}k gold! Remember to [link]({[twitch_connection_url]}) your Twitch account to Sea of Thieves and claim the gold once it's unlocked!
scheduling.alerts.content.Gold_and_Glory: Call your crew and throw a Voyage on the table — a new Gold & Glory Weekend is now live! You'll gain boosted reputation, gold, renown, and allegiance for all your high-sea hijinks!
scheduling.alerts.content.Insider_Reward: The current **Insider week** ends <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! Make sure to earn enough reputation before <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:F>.
scheduling.alerts.content.Partner_Cosmet: {[partner_name]} is hosting a {[availability_name]} for the exclusive {[reward_items]}! You can view more details by checking out their [channel]({[partner_page]}).
scheduling.alerts.content.Regular_Twitch: Sintonize e veja [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]}) por um total de **{[rewards_total_time]}** para ganhar todas os drops! Lembre-se de vincular sua conta da Twitch ao Sea of Thieves para poder resgatar os drops!
The current **Twitch Drops campaign** ends <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! Make sure to [claim]({[twitch_inventory_url]}) your drops before <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:f>.
scheduling.alerts.content.Special_Twitch: The current **Twitch Drops campaign** ends <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:R>! Make sure to [claim]({[twitch_inventory_url]}) your drops before <t:{[end_timestamp_s]}:f>.

Tune in and watch [{[availability_name]}]({[availability_link]}) for a total of **{[rewards_total_time]}** to earn all drops! Remember to link your Twitch account to Sea of Thieves and claim your drop once it's unlocked!
scheduling.alerts.short.Official_Twitch_: the Official Sea of Thieves Channel
scheduling.alerts.short.Partner_Twitch_D: qualquer Parceiro do Sea of Thieves
